original_title: Madame, Life of a Drag Queen
overview: A mini-documentary about the Puerto Rican Drag Queen "Madame LaQueer" who was a contestant on season 4 of Rupaul's Drag Race. The documentary explores the childhood and challenges of a gay man, and how the character of Madame LaQueer helped Carlos became the person he is today.
title: Madame, Life of a Drag Queen
